data.title: Local Obituary Listings in North Hills & Cranberry
data.meta_description: Visit the Devlin Funeral Home website to search local obituaries from our North Hills, PA and Cranberry, PA locations.
data.text:
Ruth&nbspMatakovich

August 12, 1922 - June 11, 2019

Ruth Matakovich (Corwin) Ruth (Corwin) Matakovich Formerly of Ross Township Ruth (Corwin) Matakovich, age 96, of Coraopolis, formerly of Ross Twp., passed away on Tuesday, June 11, 2019. Beloved wife for 57 years to the late Charles Matakovich; mother of the late Suellyn Falk and her late husband, James B. Falk; sister-in-law of Margaret B. […]

Paul &nbspHurley

September 17, 1942 - June 12, 2019

Paul Hurley Age 76, of Cranberry Twp., passed away on Wednesday, June 12, 2019. Born Sept. 17, 1942, son of the late George and Mable Hurley. Beloved husband of Alice Jean (Schumann) Hurley, whom he married on Dec. 21, 1963; loving father of Matt (Gina) and Josh Hurley; dear grandpa of Nickalas; brother of the […]

Geneva Darnelle&nbsp(Vaughan) Lozito

July 08, 1954 - June 10, 2019

Age 64 of Avalon, PA and formerly of Madison Heights, MI passed away Monday June 10, 2019 at Passavant Hositpal McCandless Twp. peacefully with her family by her side. She was born July 8, 1954 in Fredericksburg, VA. Daughter of the late Jean Snyder and George Vaughan. Raised by Grandma Ida Donahue, Inez and Jack […]

Terrance “Terry”&nbspJames Scanlon

May 14, 1949 - June 09, 2019

Terrance “Terry” James Scanlon Age 70, of Ross Township and formerly of Mt. Washington, passed away at his home on June 9, 2019, after a courageous battle with cancer. Son of the late James and Patricia (Flaherty) Scanlon. Beloved husband of 32 years to Linda (Monteverde) Scanlon. Loving father of Julia (Stefan Levine), Matthew (Amanda), […]

Charles Howard &nbspSchumann

October 24, 1947 - June 07, 2019

Charles Howard Schumann Age 71, of Cranberry Twp., passed away on June 7, 2019 at his home. Born October 24, 1947, son of the late Richard and Lavinia (Hamburger) Schumann. Beloved husband of Hoa (Bui) Schumann, whom he married on 12-7-70; loving father of Tracy (Stacey) Schumann, and the late Tuan Schumann; very proud grandfather […]

Of Franklin Park, on Friday, June 7, 2019. Beloved husband of Eileen (Bookleiner) Egerter; loving father of Cameron Egerter, Brandt Egerter (Sophie), Evan and Dillon Egerter; beloved son of Robert Egerter and the late Marjorie (Klein) Egerter; brother of Gary Egerter; proud grandfather of Ava, Conrad and Liam. Friends received Tuesday 2-4 and 6-8 p.m. […]

Mary&nbspEdleman Weller

October 31, 1926 - June 06, 2019

Age 92 of Cranberry Twp., formerly of Ross Twp. on Thursday June 6, 2019. Beloved wife of the late Clair O. Weller and the late Jack S. Edleman. Joan G.&nbsp(Gregory) Fancher

Charles W. &nbspHack

January 20, 1938 - June 06, 2019

Charles W. Hack Age 81, of Cranberry Twp., passed away on Thursday, June 6, 2019 surrounded by his loved ones. Beloved husband of Joan (Gallaher) Hack; loving father of Brad (Staci) Hack; dear grandfather of Krista and Greggory; great-grandfather of Adalynn, and Benjamin; brother of Andrew (Mary) Hack. Chuck is also survived by nieces and […]

William L.&nbspBann

January 13, 1926 - June 04, 2019

William L. Bann, 93, of Shaler Township, passed peacefully at home surrounded by family on June 4, 2019. Born to Edward and Catherine Gralish Bann on January 13, 1926, he was the beloved husband of the late Jeanne Vaughan Bann, loving father of William M. (McCarthy) Age 73, of Shaler Twp., after a long illness on Tuesday, June 4, 2019; Loving mother of Shannon Platt, Kala Zarko (John), and Eric Zarko (Kim); Proud grandma of Dalton and Zach; Also survived by loving relatives and friends. Susan F. &nbspHirth

Susan F. Hirth Age 64, of New Sewickley Twp., passed away on Tuesday, June 4, 2019 at her home, following a brief, but courageous battle. John J. &nbspBaumler Jr.

February 15, 1951 - June 03, 2019

John J. Baumler Jr. Age 68, of Cranberry Twp., passed away on June 3, 2019 at his home. John was born on Feb. 15, 1951, son of Louise and the late John J. Baumler. Beloved husband of Jacqueline “Jackie” Baumler, whom he married on Sept. 12, 1975; loving father of Sara (Jason) Burhans, and Alex […]

Carol A. &nbsp(Moore) O’Connor

December 23, 1955 - May 30, 2019

Age 63, of Ohio Township, passed peacefully and surrounded by her family May 30th. Carol will always be remembered as a strong willed woman and a brave survivor until her last day. Forever caring for others, she made her career as a nurse before starting her own family. She was the loving wife of her […]
